title: National Racing Championship 2023
description: A thrilling national racing championship where teams from all over the country competed to showcase their speed and engineering skills.

title: Engineering Innovation Award 2023
description: Awarded for outstanding innovation in suspension system design that enhanced vehicle control and safety.

title: Regional Racing Series 2023 - 1st Place
description: Achieved first place in the regional racing series by demonstrating consistent performance and teamwork.

title: Sustainability in Engineering Award
description: Recognized for pioneering sustainable engineering practices and use of eco-friendly materials in vehicle design.

title: Winter Challenge 2022 - 3rd Place
description: Secured third place in a challenging winter race, highlighting excellent vehicle performance in tough conditions.

title: Best Technical Paper - Aerodynamics Innovation
description: Awarded Best Technical Paper for innovative aerodynamic solutions that improved racing car speed and stability.
